entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
